ARABIC: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكَ لَعْنَتِىٓ إِلَىٰ يَوْمِ ٱلدِّينِ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: My curse is upon you until the Day of Reckoning.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Upon you will be My damnation till the Day of Doom."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: and My curse shall remain upon you till the Day of Resurrection.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: My condemnation will be with you until the Day of Judgment!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “And indeed My curse is upon you till the Day of Judgement.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And verily, My curse is on you till the Day of Recompense."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And surely My curse is on you to the day of judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Upon thee shall rest My curse, till the Day of Doom.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And lo! My curse is on thee till the Day of Judgment.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: My curse will remain upon you till the Day of Judgement!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And verily My curse shall be on thee till the Day of Requital,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: and indeed My curse will be on you till the Day of Retribution.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: And My curse shall be on thee till the Day of Judgment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And verily!, My Curse is on you till the Day of Recompense."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: My curse shall rest on you until the Day of Recompense'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: And My curse will be upon you until the Day of Judgment.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And indeed, upon you is My curse until the Day of Recompense."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [38:78] And indeed My curse shall be on you until the Day of Judgement’, [the Day] of Requital.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And lo! My curse) My wrath and chastisement; it is also said that Allah banished him to the isles of the sea and, hence, he goes to the land only in the form of a thief, wearing tattered clothes, and scaring people (is on you till the Day of Judgement) until the Day of Reckoning.
